title: ninnE nammiti nijamuga
sahitya:
ninnE nammiti nijamuga gati lOkamulO


anupallavi

 nannaDa calupaga nAvicAramu dIrccinambOruhAnanA divyatara jUci


caraNam   nI mahAtmyamu evarE nidAnimpa shakyamu gAdugadAshrI mAtavE nI chAyEtulanOkani 
gAncagalanE Emani ceppudu dEvI nutimpa nAduvashamA I mahilO nI dayagaliginA bhayambu tOligEnO
